data.title: Understanding Tailwind CSS
data.body: Tailwind CSS provides utility-first classes for rapid UI development. CSS allows developers to style borders with solid, dashed, or dotted lines, adjust widths, apply colors, and create rounded corners for enhancing the visual appeal of web elements effectively

data.title: Working with APIs in Next.js
data.body: Learn how to use Next.js API routes to build scalable APIs for your applications.
